job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We're working with a market leader in electronic health records (EHR) bases studies. Partnered with world class biotechnology and pharmaceutical firms, their platform runs real world evidence studies for regulatory and reimbursement purposes.Utilizing data science and AI, this company is looking for an NLP Engineer to take ownership of the NLP components, working alongside the Product Manager to drive, build and implement NLP models and infrastructure.You will:Build, refine and productionize NLP modelsVerify data quality, supervise the data and find available datasetsTrain models and tuning their hyperparametersDefine pre-processing and validation strategiesYou have:Bachelors or above in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or other related field3+ years of industry experience deploying NLP modelsExpertise with NLP techniques and librariesExpertise in visualizing and manipulating big unstructured datasetsExperience with cloud-based machine learning resources (AWS)Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.
